error.message: Call to deprecated function format_date(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('date.formatter')->format().
Call to deprecated function format_date(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::service('date.formatter')->format().
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to first_time_login.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
Parse error in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should be valid.
